original: Andersson, Carl Oscar Wilhelm, rektor, verkstadsskoleinspektör, Karlskrona, f. 22/6/88 i Karlskrona. G. 27 m. Annie Ericsson. — Pedagog, o. prakt. stud. i in- o. uti. Yrkessk :lär. 24-30, rektor v. verkst:- o. yrkessk. i Karlskrona sed. 30, verkst :sk :insp. sed. 38. Landstingsman 26-30 o. sed. 34, led. av stadsfullm. sed. 18, ordf. i beredn :utsk., ordf. i teater- o. konserthusstyr., ordf. i brandstyr., led. av styr. f. komm. fhcksk. o. h. a. L, huv:-man i Sparbanken i Karlskrona, led. av styr. f. komm. affärsverken, ordf. i System A-B, arb :komm. o. kristidsstyr. f. Blek. 1. sed. 39, inneh. även ett flert. andra komm. uppdr.
translated: Andersson, Carl Oscar Wilhelm, principal, vocational school inspector, Karlskrona, b. 22/6/88 in Karlskrona. Married to Annie Ericsson. Educator with practical studies in both national and international fields. Worked as a schoolteacher from 1924-1930 and has since been the principal of the Vocational and Crafts School in Karlskrona, with the addition of being vocational school inspector from 1938. Member of the Regional Council (Landsting) from 1926-1930 and then again from 1934, member of the City Council since 1918, chairman of the Planning Committee, chairman of the Theatre and Concert Hall Board, chairman of the Fire Board, member of the Board of Directors for the Municipality's Postgraduate School and Vocational High School, head of the Savings Bank in Karlskrona, member of the Board of Directors for the City's Business Works, chairman of System A-B, member of the Working Committee and Crisis Committee for Blekinge County since 1939, as well holding multiple other municipal positions.
